p.n: Escape From The Planet Of The Apes
p.k: 63% Apes Cornelius, Zira and Milo crash land on Earth where their newfound celebrity soon changes to notoriety and suspicion. Sequel starring Roddy McDowall
Discovering he's the son of Poseidon, school kid Percy Jackson ventures into the underworld to save his mum from Hades
One of the last people on an evacuated Earth finds himself battling to save mankind
80% Bill Murray is the cynical weatherman forced to repeat the same day over and over again. Is romancing Andie MacDowell the key to living the day right? Comedy
77% George Clooney and two pals escape the chain gang and go on a quest for treasure in 1930s Mississippi. From the Coen brothers
72% The box office smash that made a star of Julia Roberts sees ruthless businessman Richard Gere falling for a call girl he has hired for the week
81% Jim Carrey is an ordinary guy in an ordinary town. He's also the unsuspecting star of the world's longest-running reality TV show. Intelligent drama
One of the last people on an evacuated Earth finds himself battling to save mankind
80% Bill Murray is the cynical weatherman forced to repeat the same day over and over again. Is romancing Andie MacDowell the key to living the day right? Comedy
